message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a price of $20,000. I believe it holds significant value and this offer reflects that.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. However, I am only able to offer $15,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that respects both our valuations.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but the product's value to me is significantly higher. I could consider letting it go for $18,000.
Alice, thank you for considering my position. I would like to counter your offer with $16,000. This is my best offer given the value I place on the product.
